trans-unit.source: An activity that receives a message as part of a request/reply message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: To działanie, które otrzyma komunikat w ramach wymiany komunikatów żądania/odpowiedzi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość nagłówka action wiadomości.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content received by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> activity
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia zawartość odebranych przez <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"> </xref> działania

trans-unit.source: The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.
trans-unit.target: Zawartość może być jedną z następujących typów: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> when receiving a message <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type.
Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> when receiving data contract types.
Gets a collection of correlation initializers.
Gets or sets a reference to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"></xref> activity paired with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia odwołanie do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"> </xref> działania łączyć się z tym <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"> </xref> działania.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activities are used together to model a request/response message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply>działania są używane razem do modelu wymiany komunikatów żądań i odpowiedzi.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply></xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is paired with.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość określa, która <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>działania <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply>działania łączyć się z.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>
